name: Kara Kara Kara
description:
For  GMTK Game Jam 2022

In this game you need to collect black squares to collect score. Black squares hurt you so you also need to collect yellow squares to heal.

The amount of yellow squares depends of number on the dice. This number also make happen various sisuations, so be careful.

Also keep in mind that you have only 5 dice rolls to complete the level.

That's all!

There is 5 Levels!

Controls

W A S D to Move

E/Backspace to Act

R to Restart

(H - magic)

Team

I did this Game Jam alone. All sounds and music from freesound

(it's my first gamejam :D)
